1173030.name: Love Esquire - Original Soundtrack
1173030.description:
This contains the full and remastered version of all the soundtracks used in Love Esquire. Each track has its own unique, complementary sketch.

You can find the music files and sketches inside your Love Esquire Steam game folder.

UPDATE


Steam changed the way Soundtrack DLCs are implemented. They have their own music player now that you can access via your library. Because of this, we have disabled the in-game Music Room player. Please use Steam's music player instead. Thank you!
1173030.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
